╰─> To install Python packages system-wide, try apt install

    install.
    
    If you wish to install a non-Debian-packaged Python package,
    create a virtual environment using python3 -m venv path/to/venv.

    sure you have python3-full installed.
    
    If you wish to install a non-Debian packaged Python application,

    virtual environment for you. Make sure you have pipx installed.

recommendations.title: Address Frontend Security Vulnerabilities
recommendations.description: Update vulnerable frontend packages to latest secure versions
actions: Run 'npm audit fix' to automatically fix vulnerabilities
Manually update packages that cannot be automatically fixed
Consider implementing security scanning in CI/CD pipeline

recommendations.title: Implement Dependency Management Strategy
recommendations.description: Large number of dependencies detected, implement management strategy
actions: Set up automated dependency updates using Dependabot or Renovate
Implement dependency version pinning for reproducible builds
Consider consolidating duplicate dependencies across services

recommendations.title: Optimize Dependency Performance
actions: Use tree-shaking and code splitting for frontend dependencies
Implement lazy loading for non-critical dependencies
Monitor dependency bundle sizes and loading times

recommendations.title: Implement Dependency Monitoring
recommendations.description: Set up comprehensive dependency monitoring and alerting
actions: Implement performance monitoring for critical dependencies
